Transform the way you work with colors using Color Finder Pro, your go-to Chrome extension for precise and convenient color picking. Whether you're a designer, developer, or artist, Color Finder Pro offers a suite of powerful features to enhance your workflow.

Key Features:

Screen Color Picker: Easily pick any color from your screen with the advanced EyeDropper API. Capture the exact hue you need from any webpage or digital design.

Hex, RGB, and HSL Codes: Instantly convert and display color values in multiple formats. Switch effortlessly between Hex, RGB, and HSL to suit your project requirements.

Color History: Keep track of all the colors you've picked in your current session. View and reuse your recently picked colors from the history panel.

Favorites: Save your most-used colors to the favorites section for quick access. Build your personalized color palette and streamline your design process.

Advanced Sliders: Fine-tune your colors with precision using the RGB and lightness sliders. Adjust each component to achieve the perfect shade.

Accessibility Modes: Ensure your designs are accessible to everyone. Test your colors in various accessibility modes, including Protanopia, Deuteranopia, Tritanopia, and High Contrast.

Color Harmonies: Generate complementary and harmonious color schemes based on your selected color. Perfect for creating visually appealing designs.

Custom Palettes: Save and manage your custom color palettes. Name and organize your palettes for different projects and access them anytime.

Gradient Generator: Create beautiful gradients with ease. Generate linear gradients and preview them instantly within the extension.

Webpage Color Analysis: Analyze the colors used on any webpage. Get a comprehensive list of the top colors and integrate them into your designs.

Export and Import: Export your color data in various formats, including JSON, CSS, SCSS, and XML. Import color data to maintain consistency across different devices and projects.

Clipboard Integration: Quickly copy color codes to your clipboard with a single click. Enhance your efficiency and minimize manual errors.

Image Color Picker: Pick colors from any uploaded image. Simply select an image, click on a pixel, and get the exact color code.

Clear Local Storage: Easily clear your local storage to reset your color history and favorites. Start fresh whenever you need to.

Why Choose Color Finder Pro?

Color Finder Pro is designed with user experience in mind. It’s not just a tool; it’s a comprehensive solution for all your color management needs. Whether you're designing a website, creating digital art, or developing a user interface, Color Finder Pro ensures you have the best colors at your fingertips.

Get Started Today!

Install Color Finder Pro now and elevate your design process. Discover the power of precise color selection and management with this essential Chrome extension.
